extendedInfo.description: Beautiful and interesting interpretation of the game Farkle! Play dice with a cute little monster and get lots of fun and positive! If you are bored or need to do something in your spare-time, set game Moarnsters Farkle and you will not be bored! Play, overcome, win chips and get to the jackpot!Rules of the game are simple: In each round the player must throw 6 dice. You can collect a winning combination, and throw the remaining dice, or finish the round if you score more than 300 points.The ability of "Bonus Round" you can use if you collect all 6 dice in combination. You will be able to throw all dice again, keeping your previous score. The situation, when it does not fall out any winning combination, called 'FARKLE'. Then you lose all the points of this round.In the online game, players take turns throwing the dice. Everyone tries to dial 5000 or 10000 points before the opponent. In a single game you should own set the goal from 5000 to 10000 points.Opportunities of the game Moarnsters Farkle:- Synchronization with FACEBOOK- Online Game- Enjoy the gameplay!- Different game modes- Play with your friends who have iOS!- Get FREE gifts from friends- Enjoy the graphics!
